name: PlaygroundValue
desc: The types you can save in the key-value store or send in messages to live views.

items.name: case boolean(Bool)
items.desc: A value that represents a Boolean.

items.name: case data(Data)
items.desc: A value that represents raw data.

items.name: case date(Date)
items.desc: A value that represents a date.

items.name: case floatingPoint(Double)
items.desc: A value that represents a floating-point number.

items.name: case integer(Int)
items.desc: A value that represents an integer.

items.name: case string(String)
items.desc: A value that represents a string.

items.name: case array([PlaygroundValue])
items.desc: A value that represents an array that contains PlaygroundValue instances.

items.name: case dictionary([String : PlaygroundValue])
items.desc: A value that represents a mapping from strings to PlaygroundValue instances.
